div.p: Thank you for choosing to play ColorDrop Challenge (the "App"). Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use this App.

ColorDrop Challenge is designed for fun and does not collect any personal information from users. The App does not require registration, does not ask for your name, email, or any contact details, and does not access your device data, such as contacts, photos, or location.
The App does not collect or store any usage data or analytics. All gameplay data (such as scores or progress) is stored locally on your device and is not transmitted to any servers.
Since we do not collect any personal or usage data, we do not use, share, or sell your information to any third parties.
The App is suitable for all ages and does not knowingly collect any personal information from children under the age of 13 or from any user.
While no data is collected or transmitted, we are committed to providing a safe and secure game environment.
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any updates will be posted within the App or in the app store listing. Please review this policy periodically.
